sentence.Network_en: Leaves oblanceolate, pinnately divided, like the layers of the growth of chicken feathers. 1 flower stems.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶子倒披针形, 羽状分裂, 像鸡毛层层生长. 一根茎上一朵花.

sentence.Network_en: A perennial plant of the genus Sanguisorba, having pinnately compound leaves and apetalous flowers asgarnish.
sentence.Network_cn: 地榆,美洲地榆一种地榆属多年生植物, 有羽状复叶和无花瓣的花.

PerfectNetExp.abs: leaf blade papery , pinnately veined or 3 - veined , margin often coarsely dentate or serrate , rarely entire ;, 纸质的叶片 , 成羽状脉或 3 脉的 , 边缘通常粗牙齿或有锯齿 , 很少全缘;
羽状复叶  pinnately compound leaf 复叶的一种。小叶在总柄上成羽毛状排列的复叶。...回羽状复叶(如苦楝)。图34羽状复叶1.奇数羽状复叶2.偶数羽状复叶3.互生小.
